We herewith enclose the unaudited standalone and consolidated financial results along with the Audit Report for the quarter ended September 30, 2022, as required under the applicable regulations of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Earnings Call Transcript
data.news_body: Audio Recording and Transcript of the Analyst call on Audited Financial Results (Consolidated and Standalone) for the quarter / year ended March 31, 2022.

data.caption:
Audited Standalone And Consolidated Financial
Results Of The Company For The Quarter And Year Ended March 31, 2022 And Audited Standalone And Consolidated Financial Statements Of The Company For
The Year Ended March 31, 2022
data.news_body:
A meeting of the Board of Directors of Muthoot Finance Limited was held today, i.e., May 26, 2022 and the Board has inter alia:
1. Considered and approved the Audited Standalone and Consolidated financial results of the Company for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2022 and Audited Standalone and Consolidated financial statements of the Company for the year ended March 31, 2022 ;

We enclose the following documents for your records and dissemination through the website:
1. Financial Results and the Audit Reports issued by the Joint- Statutory Auditors;
2. Disclosure as required under Regulation 52 (4) of the Listing Regulations;
3. Disclosure as required under Regulation 52 (7) of the Listing Regulations; and
4. Declaration as required under Regulation 33 (3)(d), and Regulation 52 (3) (a) of the Listing Regulations.

2021.

regulations of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Financial Results For The Quarter Ended September 30, 2021.
data.news_body:
A meeting of the Board of Directors of Muthoot Finance Limited was held today, i.e., November 04,
2021 via audio visual means and the Board has considered and approved the un-audited Standalone and
Consolidated financial results of Muthoot Finance Limited for the quarter ended September 30, 2021
('Financial Results').
We enclose the following documents for your records and dissemination through the website: Muthoot Finance Ltd
1. Financial Results and the Limited Review Reports issued by the Statutory Auditors;
